keyPolicies.policyDescription: Blocked Tory (and Labour) plans for Heathrow expansion
An £800 tax cut for over 53,000 local workers in Richmond and North Kingston
£6,407,000 for local school children where it's needed most
Keeping the state pension above inflation - £650 better off than under Labour
Secured £3.8 million in funding for Kew Gardens
960 apprenticeships in Richmond Park and North Kingston since 2010

mentions.tacticalSituation: In our area it's between Robin Meltzer and the Conservatives. General Election Result 2010 showed Lib Dem 42.8% and Con 49.7%, with an indication that Green and Labour can't win here.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet does not specify the election date. It only provides partial contact information and lacks details on political experience, personal statement, and social media links.
